caption.p: June mean temperatures since 1946 with regime shift trend line for the 11 long‚Äêterm weather stations in Nunavut, Canada (Table S2). Baker Lake, Cambridge Bay, and Coral Harbour have experienced continually rising temperatures in June since 1946; Clyde, Hall Beach, and Iqaluit have experienced no significant warming in June since 1946; Alert, Eureka, Isachsen, and Resolute have experienced a regime shift from a cooling period to a warming period in June and Pond Inlet has experienced a regime shift from a steady temperature to a warming period in June
